recommendations.title: Add FAQPage Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Implementing FAQPage schema helps AI systems understand your frequently asked questions.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI systems rely on structured data to surface your content in answer boxes.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add FAQPage schema to pages with question-answer content.
recommendations.how_to_do: Use JSON-LD format to mark up your FAQ content.

recommendations.title: Add Organization Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Organization schema helps AI systems identify and display your company information.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Establishes your entity in AI knowledge graphs.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add Organization schema to your homepage.
recommendations.how_to_do: Include logo, name, URL, and contact information in JSON-LD.

recommendations.title: Optimize Meta Description
recommendations.marketing_copy: A well-crafted meta description improves how AI summarizes your content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions are often used as source material for AI-generated summaries.
recommendations.what_to_do: Write a compelling meta description that summarizes the page content.
recommendations.how_to_do: Keep it under 160 characters and include your primary keywords.
